parameters.name: EndTime
parameters.description: The end of the time range to query. Unit: milliseconds.

parameters.name: InstanceId
parameters.description: The instance ID of the asset.

parameters.name: InternetIp
parameters.description: The public IP address of the server.

parameters.name: IntranetIp
parameters.description: The private IP address of the server.

parameters.name: Operation
parameters.description:
Type of operation on a file. eg:

- **DELETE**: delete the file.
- **WRITE**: write the file.
- **READ**: read the file.
- **RENAME**: rename the file.
- **CHOWN**: set the file owner and file association group operations.

parameters.name: RuleName
parameters.description: The name of the defense rule.

parameters.name: SelectAllAcrossPages
parameters.description:
Whether to choose all fields across industries.

- **true**: yes
- **false**: no

parameters.name: StartTime
parameters.description: The beginning of the time range to query. Unit: milliseconds.

parameters.name: Status
parameters.description:
The handling status of the event. Valid values:

*   **0**: unhandled
*   **1**: handled
*   **2**: added to the whitelist

parameters.name: Uuid
parameters.description:
The UUID of the server.

> You can call the [DescribeCloudCenterInstances](~~DescribeCloudCenterInstances~~) operation to query the UUIDs of servers.
